meanings.definition: A genus of mold that includes several species known for producing antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: The penicillium in the lab is used to create medicine.
meanings.sent2: Cheese makers use penicillium to give their cheese a unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: The penicillium at the party was the life of the mold!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like penicillium in a petri dish.
meanings.sent5: The penicillium spread through the bread like wildfire.

meanings.definition: Any of various fungi of the genus Penicillium, some of which are used in making cheese and antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: I saw penicillium growing on the old bread.
meanings.sent2: The penicillium added a tangy taste to the blue cheese.
meanings.sent3: The penicillium in the fridge was having a party with the other fungi.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like penicillium in a damp cellar.
meanings.sent5: The penicillium spread its spores like a tiny army marching.
